content:
Mysteryland音乐节是荷兰主要的electronic dance音乐节，由荷兰的ID＆T组织。Mysteryland是荷兰首个音乐节类活动，其组织者称该活动是荷兰最古老的舞曲音乐节。近年来音乐节一直在Haarlemmermeer的Haarlemmermeerse Bos举行（是举办2002年荷兰园艺节Floriade的场地）。按照传统，音乐节是在八月的最后一个周末举行。下一次举办是2020年8月28日至30日。自2015年以来，音乐节已从一日活动改为三天露营活动。每年，Mysteryland音乐节都会接待来自100多个国家/地区的100.000多名游客。

 

2011年，国际版的Mysteryland在智利举行，这是音乐节首次在荷兰境外举行。

 

Mysteryland USA是Mysteryland的美国版本，于2014年5月的Memorial Day周末在伯特利·伍兹艺术中心（1969年曾举办伍德斯托克音乐节）首次举行，大牌DJ包括Kaskade，Moby，Steve Aoki，Dillon Francis和Flosstradamus。2017年的Mysteryland USA被取消。
contentEn:
Mysteryland is the leading electronic dance music festival in the Netherlands,[1] organized by the Netherlands-based promoter ID&T. Being the first of its kind in the country when it was established, its organizers have billed the event as the oldest dance music festival in the Netherlands. It has most recently been held at Haarlemmermeerse Bos in Haarlemmermeer; an exhibition ground that hosted the 2002 edition of the Dutch gardening festival Floriade. It is traditionally held on the final weekend of August; the next date is August 27-29, 2021. Since 2015, the festival has changed from a one-day to a three-day event with camping. Each year, more than 100.000 visitors from over 100 nationalities are welcomed at Mysteryland.

 

In 2011, an international edition of Mysteryland was held in Chile, the first to be held outside the Netherlands.

 

Mysteryland USA, the American version of Mysteryland, was first held on Memorial Day weekend, May 2014, at the Bethel Woods Center for the Arts, the site of the notable Woodstock festival held in 1969.[2] Headliners included Kaskade, Moby, Steve Aoki, Dillon Francis, and Flosstradamus.[3] Mysteryland USA 2017 was canceled.[4]

 

References

  1. ^ "Mysteryland". Mysteryland official website. Retrieved 2020-02-19.
  2. ^ "Mysteryland Electronic Festival Headed to Original Woodstock Site". Spin. Retrieved 5 December 2013.
  3. ^ "Mysteryland USA: Kaskade, Steve Aoki, Acres of Music Rule EDM Fest on Woodstock's Grounds". Billboard.
  4. ^ "Mysteryland USA". www.mysteryland.us.
remarks:
本词条汉字内容由 @多频百科团队 翻译+编辑
原文译自 https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mysteryland
